Table.Name: atlasSource
Table.Description: Contains merged sources from detections in atlasDetection

Column.Name: sourceID
Column.Description: UID (unique over entire VSA via programme ID prefix) of this merged detection as assigned by merge algorithm

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: frameSetID
Column.Description: UID of the set of frames that this merged source comes from

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Celestial Right Ascension

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Celestial Declination

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Column.Name: l
Column.Description: Galactic longitude

Column.Name: b
Column.Description: Galactic latitude

Column.Name: lambda
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 1

Column.Name: eta
Column.Description: SDSS system spherical co-ordinate 2

Column.Name: priOrSec
Column.Description: Seam code for a unique (=0) or duplicated (!=0) source (eg. flags overlap duplicates).

Column.Name: umgPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour U-G (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: umgPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour U-G

Column.Name: gmrPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour G-R (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: gmrPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour G-R

Column.Name: rmiPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour R-I (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: rmiPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour R-I

Column.Name: imzPnt
Column.Description: Point source colour I-Z (using aperMag3)

Column.Name: imzPntErr
Column.Description: Error on point source colour I-Z

Column.Name: umgExt
Column.Description: Extended source colour U-G (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

Column.Name: umgExtErr
Column.Description: Error on extended source colour U-G

Column.Name: gmrExt
Column.Description: Extended source colour G-R (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

Column.Name: gmrExtErr
Column.Description: Error on extended source colour G-R

Column.Name: rmiExt
Column.Description: Extended source colour R-I (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

Column.Name: rmiExtErr
Column.Description: Error on extended source colour R-I

Column.Name: imzExt
Column.Description: Extended source colour I-Z (using aperMagNoAperCorr3)

Column.Name: imzExtErr
Column.Description: Error on extended source colour I-Z

Column.Name: mergedClassStat
Column.Description: Merged N(0,1) stellarness-of-profile statistic

Column.Name: mergedClass
Column.Description: Class flag from available measurements (1|0|-1|-2|-3|-9=galaxy|noise|stellar|probableStar|probableGalaxy|saturated)

Column.Name: pStar
Column.Description: Probability that the source is a star

Column.Name: pGalaxy
Column.Description: Probability that the source is a galaxy

Column.Name: pNoise
Column.Description: Probability that the source is noise

Column.Name: pSaturated
Column.Description: Probability that the source is saturated

Column.Name: eBV
Column.Description: The galactic dust extinction value measured from the Schlegel, Finkbeiner & Davis (1998) maps. This uses the correction given in Bonifacio, Monai & Beers (2000). This correction reduces the extinction value in regions of high extinction (E(B-V)>0.1)

Column.Name: aU
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the U band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aG
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the G band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aR
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the R band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aI
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the I band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aZ
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the Z band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: uPetroMag
Column.Description: Extended source U mag (Petrosian)

Column.Name: uPetroMagErr
Column.Description: Error in extended source U mag (Petrosian)

Column.Name: uPsfMag
Column.Description: Point source profile-fitted U mag

Column.Name: uPsfMagErr
Column.Description: Error in point source profile-fitted U mag

Column.Name: uSerMag2D
Column.Description: Extended source U mag (profile-fitted)

Column.Name: uSerMag2DErr
Column.Description: Error in extended source U mag (profile-fitted)

Column.Name: uAperMag3
Column.Description: Default point source U aperture corrected mag (2.0 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: uAperMag3Err
Column.Description: Error in default point/extended source U mag (2.0 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: uAperMag4
Column.Description: Point source U aperture corrected mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: uAperMag4Err
Column.Description: Error in point/extended source U mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: uAperMag6
Column.Description: Point source U aperture corrected mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: uAperMag6Err
Column.Description: Error in point/extended source U mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: uAperMagNoAperCorr3
Column.Description: Default extended source U aperture mag (2.0 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: uAperMagNoAperCorr4
Column.Description: Extended source U aperture mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: uAperMagNoAperCorr6
Column.Description: Extended source U aperture mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: uHlCorSMjRadAs
Column.Description: Seeing corrected half-light, semi-major axis in U band

Column.Name: uGausig
Column.Description: RMS of axes of ellipse fit in U

Column.Name: uEll
Column.Description: 1-b/a, where a/b=semi-major/minor axes in U

Column.Name: uPA
Column.Description: ellipse fit celestial orientation in U

Column.Name: uErrBits
Column.Description: processing warning/error bitwise flags in U

Column.Name: uAverageConf
Column.Description: average confidence in 2 arcsec diameter default aperture (aper3) U

Column.Name: uClass
Column.Description: discrete image classification flag in U

Column.Name: uClassStat
Column.Description: N(0,1) stellarness-of-profile statistic in U

Column.Name: uppErrBits
Column.Description: additional WFAU post-processing error bits in U

Column.Name: uSeqNum
Column.Description: the running number of the U detection

Column.Name: uXi
Column.Description: Offset of U detection from master position (+east/-west)

Column.Name: uEta
Column.Description: Offset of U detection from master position (+north/-south)

Column.Name: gPetroMag
Column.Description: Extended source G mag (Petrosian)

Column.Name: gPetroMagErr
Column.Description: Error in extended source G mag (Petrosian)

Column.Name: gPsfMag
Column.Description: Point source profile-fitted G mag

Column.Name: gPsfMagErr
Column.Description: Error in point source profile-fitted G mag

Column.Name: gSerMag2D
Column.Description: Extended source G mag (profile-fitted)

Column.Name: gSerMag2DErr
Column.Description: Error in extended source G mag (profile-fitted)

Column.Name: gAperMag3

Column.Description: Error in point/extended source G mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: gAperMag6
Column.Description: Point source G aperture corrected mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: gAperMag6Err
Column.Description: Error in point/extended source G mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: gAperMagNoAperCorr3
Column.Description: Default extended source G aperture mag (2.0 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: gAperMagNoAperCorr4
Column.Description: Extended source G aperture mag (2.8 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: gAperMagNoAperCorr6
Column.Description: Extended source G aperture mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Name: gHlCorSMjRadAs
Column.Description: Seeing corrected half-light, semi-major axis in G band

Column.Name: gGausig
Column.Description: RMS of axes of ellipse fit in G

Column.Name: gEll
Column.Description: 1-b/a, where a/b=semi-major/minor axes in G

Column.Name: gPA
Column.Description: ellipse fit celestial orientation in G

Column.Name: gErrBits
Column.Description: processing warning/error bitwise flags in G

Column.Name: gAverageConf
Column.Description: average confidence in 2 arcsec diameter default aperture (aper3) G

Column.Name: gClass
Column.Description: discrete image classification flag in G

Column.Name: gClassStat
Column.Description: N(0,1) stellarness-of-profile statistic in G

Column.Name: gppErrBits
Column.Description: additional WFAU post-processing error bits in G

Column.Name: gSeqNum
Column.Description: the running number of the G detection

Column.Name: gXi
Column.Description: Offset of G detection from master position (+east/-west)

Column.Name: gEta
Column.Description: Offset of G detection from master position (+north/-south)
